name: GROW UP (itch) (SpiceCabinet)
description:
GROW UP

In this Spice Cabinet game you will re-live your childhood as you explore your home and learn new things. Some things were good experiences and some were more bad than good. Go through life learning VALUABLE lessons such as to not eat the dog food and to stay out of your parents room. 

Do your best to learn as much as you can, get your parents keys by their bed and get out the front door without dying in the process!

Simple Controls
W,A,S,D to move and Enter to interact with things.

Made for LD44 - Your life is currency

P.S. Babies cant open doors and dogs/parents aren't friendly ;)
